publicationStmt.publisher: Are to be sould by P. Stent [i.e. J. Hind],

notesStmt.note: On the engraved title page, Hind's imprint has been partly erased and replaced by that of P. Stent.
No copy of the first state is known, but the British Library has 2 copies the second state with P. Stent's name in imprint--STC.
Imperfect; imprint altered and text not filmed.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
